content.html: I use mechanical keyboard so that no one wants to sit in one room with me and I can work comfortably alone. Noise cancelling headphones are so that I could stand sitting in one room with that keyboard
content.value:
I use mechanical keyboard so that no one wants to sit in one room with me and I can work comfortably alone.

Noise cancelling headphones are so that I could stand sitting in one room with that keyboard
